roleset.name: determined by chance, based on individual preference

role.descr: thing that is determined by chance
whom it is arbitrary to, perceiver of arbtrariness

roleset.note: Based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.

example.name: All args
example.text: Honestly the 10% was arbitrary to me and I was only using it because it is the only standard that I know of for donating.
